packages.package: Basic or Named Perils Insurance Policy
packages.description: Personal Liability Insurance Policy - Provides additional body injury or property damage caused to others.
This policy provides comprehensive coverage on the big-ticket items such as the home or apartment, as well as content coverage.
This policy provides extensive coverage for higher value homes with specialized insurance needs due to customizations, content and features.
Provides an additional $1M in body injury or property damage caused to others
